meanings.definition: A person or thing that breaks new ground or initiates a new trend.
meanings.sent1: The groundbreakers in the fashion industry always come up with new styles.
meanings.sent2: The groundbreakers in technology often create innovative products.
meanings.sent3: The groundbreakers at the party were the first to start dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like groundbreakers, paving the way for future innovations.
meanings.sent5: The groundbreakers in science make discoveries that change the world.
